data.name: IDS_InEncodingFormNotSupported
data.value: The input data format is not supported by this converter

data.name: IDS_OutEncodingFormNotSupported
data.value: The output data format is not supported by this converter

data.name: IDS_EncodingConvTypeNotSpecified
data.value: Either the ConversionType or the EncodingForm must be specified

data.name: IDS_InvalidConversionType
data.value: The configured conversion type (Unicode vs. non-Unicode) is invalid for this converter

data.name: IDS_kStatus_OutOfMemory
data.value: Unable to allocate required memory

data.name: IDS_NoReturnData
data.value: The converter DLL returned no data! Is the table/map correct?

data.name: IDS_NoReturnDataBadOutForm
data.value: No data to return! Perhaps bad output encoding form.

data.name: IDS_IncompleteChar
data.value: Bad input data (lone surrogate, incomplete UTF8 sequence)

data.name: IDS_NoAvailableConverters
data.value: No installed converter supports the extension of the given ConverterSpec or the given 'ProcessTypeFlag' (did you forget the ProcessTypeFlag?)

data.name: IDS_kStatus_InvalidForm
data.value: inForm or outForm parameter doesn't match mapping (bytes/Unicode mismatch)

data.name: IDS_kStatus_InvalidMapping
data.value: The compiled mapping data is not recognizable

data.name: IDS_kStatus_CompilationFailed
data.value: mapping compilation failed (syntax errors, etc)

data.name: IDS_kStatus_NameNotFound
data.value: couldn't find the requested name: '{0}'

data.name: IDS_kStatus_Exception
data.value: an internal error has occurred in the TECkit DLL

data.name: IDS_kStatus_BadMappingVersion
data.value: compiled mapping is not a version we can handle

data.name: IDS_kStatus_InvalidConverter
data.value: converter object is corrupted (or not really a TECkit_Converter at all)

data.name: IDS_kStatus_ConverterBusy
data.value: can't initiate a conversion, as the converter is already in the midst of an operation

data.name: IDS_NotEnoughBuffer
data.value: Not a large enough buffer was provided; contact the vendor

data.name: IDS_SyntaxErrorInTable
data.value: syntax error in the CC table

data.name: IDS_CantOpenReadMap
data.value: Unable to open or read the map file '{0}'

data.name: IDS_NoConverter
data.value: No encoding converter by the name '{0}'

data.name: IDS_NoErrorCode
data.value: Oops, this error is not being handled; contact the EncCnvtrs vendor

data.name: IDS_RegistryCorrupt
data.value: The repository information store appears to be corrupted. You should reinstall or use the repository interface to add converters

data.name: IDS_MissingConverter
data.value: One or more of the converters in this virtual converter are missing

data.name: IDS_ConverterPluginUninstall
data.value: This converter is a plug-in and must be uninstalled rather than removed;

data.name: IDS_Exception
data.value: an internal error has occurred in EncConverters and/or the converter DLLs (TECkit or CC)

data.name: IDS_InvalidCharFound
data.value: No mapping was found from the source to the target encoding

data.name: IDS_TruncatedCharFound
data.value: All of the source data was read, and a character sequence was incomplete

data.name: IDS_IllegalCharFound
data.value: A character sequence was found in the source which is disallowed in the source encoding scheme

data.name: IDS_InvalidTableFormat
data.value: An error occurred trying to read the backing data for the converter

data.name: IDS_AddFontFirst
data.value: No font name entry '{0}'! You must call the 'AddFont' method first before calling this method

data.name: IDS_InvalidNormalizeForm
data.value: Invalid NormalizeFlags form

data.name: IDS_NoAliasName
data.value: Alias name does not exist

data.name: IDS_ConverterAlreadyExists
data.value: A converter by this name already exists

data.name: IDS_NoImplementDetails
data.value: Some implementation details are missing

data.name: IDS_NoEncodingName
data.value: No encoding by the name '{0}'

data.name: IDS_NeedSpecTypeInfo
data.value: There are multiple implementations of this mapping, you must specify which one's properties you want (e.g. '{0}' see BuildConverterName)

data.name: IDS_InvalidAliasName
data.value: Invalid Alias Name

data.name: IDS_FallbackTwoStepsRequired
data.value: Fallback converters require two steps

data.name: IDS_FallbackSimilarConvType
data.value: The Fallback converter must have a similar ConvType as the main converters (they don't have to both be bi-directional, but they need to have the same input and output type: Unicode vs. Legacy)

data.name: IDS_InvalidMappingName
data.value: Invalid character in mapping name (e.g. ';')

data.name: IDS_InstallFont
data.value: The font '{0}' doesn't appear to be installed!
